alert.note: Alert for Gray; Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:04PM CDT until July 07 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LIPSCOMB...NORTHERN WHEELER...NORTHERN GRAY...ROBERTS... HEMPHILL AND SOUTHERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 703 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Wolf Creek Park to 7 miles northwest of Lora to 4 miles north of Lefors, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Lipscomb, Canadian, Miami, Briscoe, Wheeler, Lefors, Higgins, Wolf Creek Park, New Mobeetie, Allison, Glazier, Lake Marvin, Lora, Codman and Mobeetie. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Gray; Hemphill; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts; Wheeler
